website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for a moderately priced face treatment, although a higher-end cream may provide more dramatic results.
pros: This lotion contains vitamins B3 and B5 to nourish the skin
It also includes humectants to moisturize the skin and make it feel softer
cons: The lotion may be too thick for some buyers, and it may also cause skin irritation

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT an Olay product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Olay's total effects for years and it is a great product. What i received from this site is NOT Olay's total effects! I noticed right away the color difference. The real thing is off white. This one is a peach color. Olay is very thick, this product is thin like cheap hand lotion. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: dave petersen

customer_reviews.title: I doubt this product is genuine 🤔
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered Olay Total Effect, I loved it. But this time the product has very details on the bottle. No Active Ingredients, No expiration date. The cream has different fragrances and color. Ofcourse, it had no seal. See my pics for comparison. Will not buy this product from Amazon again 😡
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Doubt authentic
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years. Not the same packaging as when I buy in stores I tried to remove clear top and the entire top half came right off also, the safety piece that is normally in the spout was not present I don’t believe it to be authentic
customer_reviews.author: Melissa757

customer_reviews.title: Product caused hives & small bumps after first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with high expectations since it was made by Olay & I found it impressive to be a 7 in 1 product. It arrived the evening before I left for vacation, I eagerly used it the morning I left, unfortunately, to my surprise my face broke out in hives & small bumps all over that day, I did not try using it again. It took 4 days for the hives & small bumps to disappear. My skin is not normally sensitive to products, I use lots of products regularly & even wear full makeup daily. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ickes

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Fake. FAKE. Faaaaaaaaaaaake. I’ve used brand and specific lotion for YEARS and this is ain’t it. This is fake, I am 100% sure. I only saw an image of the bottle, not the box. Which I’m skeptical of then shipping in a box the first place. The box is a dead giveaway. What a joke, the font isn’t even the same on the bottle. NICE TRY. BACK IT GOES.
customer_reviews.author: Jara Anton

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, creamy, but light moisturizer. Not at all greasy.
customer_reviews.text: With continuous use, I have seen my lines and wrinkles diminish and not be so deep. This moisturizer absorbs into my skin quickly and doesn't leave a greasy residue. Leaves my face feeling soft and smooth to the touch. My make-up goes on smoothly and stays in place. It keeps my face moisturized without the shine and greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: CDT

customer_reviews.title: Is it expired or fake? Or just turned bad?
customer_reviews.text: I thought I hit a bargain but I was obviously mistaken. The cream is sticky and greasy and turns to a clump upon application. I used to massage it in but this one just turns into something glue- like after. I bought a small one from my pharmacy and it wasn't doing this. So... I don't know what's up.
customer_reviews.author: mayumi

customer_reviews.title: I'm really glad I switched
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to this because the moisturizer I was using went up in price (and it was already expensive). I'm really glad I switched. I have normal to oily skin and am 32, for me this is the perfect balance of lightweight moisturizer for everyday use. It makes your skin soft and hydrates it but does not leave it oily. I thought I may need something heaver for the winter but this has not been the case. Lastly, the design is very easy to use and control how much product comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: so soft
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff. you only need a tiny bit, i even use less than one pump and it covers my whole face. this has lasted me about 4 months i think! it's been so soft and moisturizing. i don't know about the fine lines because i don't have any yet. i love Olay and think they have products that actually work!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: and not in a good, tingly kind of way
customer_reviews.text: This stuff burns my face, and not in a good, tingly kind of way. It was painful and my face would be irritated for the rest of the day. Gave it to my boyfriend and he said it feels fine on his skin, so at least it's not going to waste. But I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: this_flight_tonight

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, but for some reason this particular jar had a heavy perfume smell. It was also an odd color and really thick. I assume it was either defective or expired. This is the second time I was very unhappy with a beauty product I ordered from Amazon. I won't order them anymore - not worth the savings if the products are sub-par and I can't even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good anti-ageing face moisturizer cream
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great moisturizer and I have been using it for years. It helps me with the dark spots, dryness, smoothens fine lines and the moisturizer evens out the skin. It helps in shrinking the pores tiny bit. The cap of the bottle closes with a click which ensures it doesn’t leak. It also makes it easy to handle while traveling. Just one pump of the cream is more than enough for one apply. Although I wish it had a little more quantity for this price. I feel it’s a complete package and if you are looking for a anti-ageing cream then it’s a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Komal Sorte

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer. I've tried others and keep coming back to this one. It is lightweight and gives my skin a little glow. I also have sensitive skin and never had a reaction to it. I love ordering it from Amazon because the price is awesome compared to other stores. I use it in the morning and at night so I buy 1 bottle every month. I hope they keep selling it at this price. Such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Not what was advertised and not what I thought I was purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I order nothing added moisturizer and got a moisturizer with foundation in it. Can’t use......
customer_reviews.author: Nancie

customer_reviews.title: Against skin become older
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom. She use olay 7 in 1 for many times. Her skin is shinny than before. Whether you believe it or not, 7 in one is a good product for total repair, but not the best for every function.
customer_reviews.author: wunaiyonghenger

customer_reviews.title: 72 and hardly any lines.
customer_reviews.text: My Dr asked why I don't have wrinkles! Use this around my mouth before bedtime. Smooth and pleasant scent. Great price for keeping me look younger.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H Benson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer. I've been using it for months along with Olay Regenerist facial scrub and it helps keep my face looking fresh and youthful. Surprisingly, it helps keep my rosacea at bay more than products made specifically for that. Thanks, Olay!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: Hey, I'm a guy!!!
customer_reviews.text: but you know what? We don't want wrinkles any more than a woman does, so I tried this product, use it after every shower and behold after a week or so of using it, there is a visible difference in my skins appearance.... brighter sheen, softer feel, and reduced lines... it seriously helps make you appear more vibrant... guarantee you will like this guys!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Malouin

customer_reviews.title: Olay 7
customer_reviews.text: This Olay 7 is just great. I've been using this cream for about 20 years. I'm going on 70 and I'm told I could pass for 40.
customer_reviews.author: Rose  k.

customer_reviews.title: and my skin has never felt better. It is incredibly smooth and soft
customer_reviews.text: This will be my new daily moisturizer. I have been using for about 10 days, an honest pea size amount twice per day, and my skin has never felt better. It is incredibly smooth and soft. I can't speak to the age-reversing quality, as I'm using it more as a preventative measure. This lotion also has a really gentle, mild, but lovely scent. My boyfriend can't get enough of the fragrance!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Misleading package. Only a tiiny amount in bottle. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is packaged in a big box but only a very small amount of cream. Packaging very misleading. Cream does not work as promised. Very dissappointed with this product. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Skin is nice and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. My face is soft and I haven't had any issues with drying all winter. It hasn’t made me 25 years old yet, but I am happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: william whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this online!
customer_reviews.text: I used Olay for a very long time and was very happy with the effect on my skin, i usually buy it in the pharmacy, but when i bought this product online, my skin starts to get itchy, flaky, and very red, like a had hives all over my face. This product is NOT AUTHENTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Maria V. Camitan

customer_reviews.title: I will buy from an actual store that way I know what I’m getting
customer_reviews.text: I use it on a nightly basis however this bottle was tinted and the information when I ordered did not state that it was I don’t believe this bottle is the real Olay as there is no information on the back of the bottle
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a face moisturiser and read the great reviews, so I gave it a shot! I put this on right after my shower. It made my face feel so good and I noticed a difference. An hour or so later I looked in the mirror and I swear my face looked relaxed, my eyes were bright. I had a kinda nice glow or tan to my skin, like I had gotten a little sun. It kept my face moist all day. A family member commented I looked younger and really rested!! I'm sold, this is good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Swan

customer_reviews.title: This could very well be something else other than Oil of Olay
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that it was not sealed and the box was not in good shape and there is a tip that's supposed to be on the bottle and it was not there..
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Greene

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff but I have had to crack the top off to get the last of the cream out. Best stuff all around. Wish it came in a jar like the night cream does. This is AWESOME moisturizer. I am 62 and use it all the time.I have extremely sensitive skin and this stuff has been the greatest. Keeps my face really soft. Have no wrinkles yet. Been using it for years. Love OLAY PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grant

customer_reviews.title: I've been a fan of Olay forever. Constantly getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Olay forever. Constantly getting compliments on the youthfulness of my skin. I've worn this for at least 5 years now. Make a note that there is a fragrance free formula and one without SPF.
customer_reviews.author: PhD-iva

customer_reviews.title: I got acne when I started using this
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the way this feels when it goes on, that's the good part. The bad part is the smell and that I now have acne for the first time in many years. I forgot how awful it is to get acne. Not worth the money I saved switching from Sircuit Skin's Day Care ...which I will be switching back to. If you want a mostly unused bottle of this Oil of Olay stuff I will send you mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: have great skin, few wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this daily for about 11 days. I am 68 , have great skin, few wrinkles. Did not notice any difference. Prior to Olay I had been using Clinique daily moisturizer. Might continue to use Olay since it is more affordable than Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: I'm a cosmetic/beauty product nut & love trying all different brands & types of products
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cosmetic/beauty product nut & love trying all different brands & types of products, including moisturizers. Hands down this is the moisturizer I return to every time! Its thick enough to really hydrate my skin yet it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy. It also doesn't flake off my face after application when I apply primer and foundation, like several other products I have tried. Tops! Hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This cream is the BEST! I'll buy it again! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Price was great, but seems they have changed the formula
customer_reviews.text: Price was great, but seems they have changed the formula. Ive bpught this for years and now it seems greasy and makes my face red. And it's runny not as creamy. Feel I need to find another product now. How unfortuneate
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can recall. Too long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ping

customer_reviews.title: Different formulation
customer_reviews.text: They've changed their formulation. The coloration is different, and it's now scented. Not recommended if you've been a long-time user like me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Truong

customer_reviews.title: Best face lotion yet
customer_reviews.text: I love this face cream. It's not heavy and absorbs quickly. I love all the 7 benefits all in one.
customer_reviews.author: RuthiD

customer_reviews.title: Creamy
customer_reviews.text: I've used Total Effects for over a year. It is cy and provides wonderful moisture. Unlike many face products, this isn't one which focuses on minimizing the look of wrinkles, products which can be very drying. Instead, Total Effects focuses on moisturizing your skin -- wrinkles and all! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Been using okay for a year and I have to say it’s worth and very effective. My wrinkles are less now and I have fair skin now
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly rose Caguiat De la vega

customer_reviews.title: Very good cream
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. She really liked this. I think it really improved my mom’s skin by toning it.
customer_reviews.author: Florian

customer_reviews.title: Good goop
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, subtle glow under my powder. Alas it does not stop aging because my birthday still arrived on its usual day and I'm a year older. Oh well, I like the lotion, it's moisture without getting too oily.
customer_reviews.author: Xristine

customer_reviews.title: Great daily moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily moisturizer, and I couldn't be more pleased! It soaks in thoroughly and quickly, and does't leave my face feeling sticky. It also doesn't have a strong fragrance which is great for my sensitive skin. I have noticed that the fine lines starting to develop on my forehead and around my lips disappeared after a week or two of use. This is now a staple of my beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: AEN10

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't make a difference been using daily for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Hug life

customer_reviews.title: Olay Face Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product many times and love it. There should have been a little stopper to protect the cream and to assure your customer that no one had opened the item or used any of it. This added protection was missing.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Poor Item Description
customer_reviews.text: Olay and their sellers need to be more clear about the differences between the many variations of this "Total Effects" moisturizer. This original formula does not state anywhere that it contains SPF or fragrance, both of which are extremely irritating to sensitive skin. They do make a fragrance free formula, but it is almost identical to the other versions. A more obvious difference in the packaging/presentation of the different formulas would be greatly appreciated. I don't want to spend $20 on a tiny bottle of lotion that is completely unusable due to the unmentioned and unnecessary "fragrance"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this moisturizer in the winter when my face gets ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer in the winter when my face gets very dry. It soaks in quickly and is not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: You can actually watch the transformation as you are moisturizing your face.
customer_reviews.author: meched

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Olay Total Effects 7-in-1 Anti-Aging Moisturizer for over eleven years and attribute the fact of my looking younger partially to its ability to even out skin tone and reduce wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Everett

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love it-makes my skin so velvety. So much cheaper on Amazon than at local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sheley

customer_reviews.title: Good when you're in your 30's
customer_reviews.text: I had tried this moisturizer back in my 20's a few times and didn't really like it, I felt it wasn't "doing anything"... Well I didn't have fine lines then lol. Now at 35 this stuff is great! Creamy, easy to apply and leaves your skin feeling clean and moisturized. The smell is nice to! Great buy :)
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Back Again
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before, tried others but I have gone back to Olay, don't think I'll change again. I like it because it never feels greasy, and you only need to use a very small amount. I had some dryness on my face and after just a few days it was gone...great under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I have others I enjoy just as ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I have others I enjoy just as much, so it didn't make me want to totally switch, but I liked it. For the price, it's about what you'd expect, but I'm not at a place that I'm willing to spend tons on stuff, so this is great for now.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kubiszewski

customer_reviews.title: This moisturizer was everything I expect it to be
customer_reviews.text: It served its purpose (to moisturize). I've been using it for three months now, and I never had a problem with it irritating my skin or breaking out pimples. The moisturizer feels clean and hydrating, and not oily and gross. I've also notice my pores to be tighter, and it makes my skin a lot smoother in relation to the other moisturizers that I've bot in the past. I would definitely recommend this product, and continue buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: With my dry skin, moisturizers are very important. Moisturizing my face after showering is very important. This light, silky moisturizer stays with me through the day. The sun protection is very important to me. I don't know how I'd manage without my Olay products.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Anything but natural. Skin is all natural it likes natural products not synthetic and lab Nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for more than 2 years and i can say my skin has never been the same since...smooth and even-toned.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelife

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: ive been using it for a long time now...so far so good..makes my skin nice and supple. i stopped it a year ago after using it for a few years and my skin changes dramatically..oh well mabe its because i moved into a colder country and didnt use any moisturizer at all after that!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a part of my daily facial routine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Feels great and can tell a difference almost instantly!
customer_reviews.text: Feels wonderful and I can tell a difference in just one week.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch.
customer_reviews.text: I use total effects all the time and as soon as I opened this I noticed the dispenser did Not have a plug in it. Also 7 Signs is totally white and this lotion was pink. It looked more like the equate version of total effects. It worked as a moisturizer but not as good as 7Signs total effects. Feel like it was a bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: ... of Olay on my skin and this product is great. Will keep on buying it
customer_reviews.text: Have always used oil of Olay on my skin and this product is great. Will keep on buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The Ponds brand that I have is way better and cost way less I might of only paid ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a total rip off my face feels dry not long after using it . The Ponds brand that I have is way better and cost way less I might of only paid 5 bucks for it.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Always get complimented of being a younger looking. I am always using this product , in the morning after I woke up and in the evening before I go to bed. Been using it since 2012
customer_reviews.author: Lady G

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Like that it is a good moisturizer. Not greasy. Protects my face from the sun
customer_reviews.author: eileen lujan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and for a 66 year old lady my fine lines look more tame
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: Always Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product every two months. I am always extremely pleased. Every aspect of this transaction was perfect. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this moisturizer for 10 years and I love it. I always try new ones but always come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Marie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my wife looking young
customer_reviews.text: Olay has been around for a long time, so I trust the brand. Although my wife uses Clinique products mainly, I bought this because it showed up when I searched for "made in USA" products. Makes a great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Glen B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does not leave my face greasy. Seems to have helped my pores shrink on my cheeks and nose, but I am also using a new face wash and drinking matcha tea... So who knows. Still is a refreshing facial lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love Olay products
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a few yrs now and honestly, I wouldn't think of using another lotion on my face!! I love Olay products. You can really tell a difference in your face after using this Total Effects lotion by Olay!! Would definitely recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Great for moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Olay since I was 16 and I never notice any firming or any difference. Perhaps because I am still young but I do notice some eye wrinkles and this has not helped at all. It is however, a great moisturizer :)
customer_reviews.author: gee008

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife. The bottle looks great in my bathroom drawer I guess. She seems to like it alright, her only complaint was that she wanted a cream that was night-time only (this has SPF protection). Oh well, she still uses it and likes it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Great skin feel, not sure about effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer smells delightful and is really smooth and luxurious. I can't speak to its anti-aging effects, I haven't really noticed any difference, but this moisturizer feels great on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mey

customer_reviews.title: This is a valid moisturizer at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time with no issues. I use it as a moisturizing cream for nighttime.
customer_reviews.author: BgH

customer_reviews.title: This product was purchased for a friend; however, ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for a friend; however, I have not received any negative comments from them concerning it. I have used Oil of Olay in the past and find that it does what it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Worked good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Worked good but not great. I took pictures before and after usage and really did not see a noticeable difference. It did make my face feel soft though but that's not it's only goal. I still aged!
customer_reviews.author: Missy T

customer_reviews.title: I love the feel of this moisurizer but I really can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this moisurizer but I really can't say how well it keeps the appearance of winkles down as I use this and a couple of other products throughout the week depending on my schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite daily moisturizer. My area is very humid. This is not sticky as some have been.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I always use this product and is amazing, I'm 37 years old, and everyone thinks I'm around 28
customer_reviews.author: Shockmont Drackguticknovick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have just been using it for a few weeks but my face is so soft and velvety. I use it every day, I am using it as more of a prevention of wrinkles since I am still in my twenties but my skin looks really great with this moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Love Olay
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Olay products for many many years. I like the fact that there is sunscreen which is needed for golfing and gardening. It makes this old face appear fresh and alive and wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Face Cream
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I question about this face cream is if there is any sunscreen, print is too small on bottle to review aside from that it has a pleasant mild fragrance, feels good on skin is not heavy at all
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Cali

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I use this as general moisturizer at night. Does the anti-aging properties work? Who knows? I look about the same age asr than most women with my completion and age group.
customer_reviews.author: 2teach2

customer_reviews.title: Anti-Aging Daily Moisturizer 1.7 Fl.oz
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, notice dark spots are lighter. The Anti-Aging Daily Moisturizer feels great on my face and neck, notice my face does not feel so tight and dry. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit me
customer_reviews.text: Texture daub up oil some greasy,not quite suitable for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t so sure of buying this product because of all the reviews but I must say, this is the only moisturizer that helps shrink my pores that’s why I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this daily for over a year. ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this daily for over a year. I can definitely tell a difference in my skin. Its not too greasy. Just the right amount of moisturizer for daily use. I put it on before my make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: ... appreciate that I can order beauty products at a good price and have them delivered to my door
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that I can order beauty products at a good price and have them delivered to my door. This is a good product, non greasy and overtime will hopefully do what it says :)
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I was tired of spending money on anti aging products and finding out the only active ingredient was sunscreen! I'm 39 so I'm using it more as preventive so I'm not sure if it cures wrinkles but I have noticed a difference in my face, I had some large pore issues and it surprisingly seemed to help with that also. I was worried about breakouts that some products seem to cause but my face has been clearer than usual!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: forever young
customer_reviews.text: keeping me looking young and gives my skin that glow I like. I would highly recommend this product and will continue use in the future
customer_reviews.author: JDUB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for at least two years. The time before when I ordered the moisturizer I received the one with foundation in it. Don't know why. I use it when I am going some place but prefer the product without it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Dunn Frame

customer_reviews.title: ... me look younger" it means make me break out like I'm 13 years old
customer_reviews.text: If by "make me look younger" it means make me break out like I'm 13 years old, then yea it works. :-/
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Fake. Counterfeit. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This item is counterfeit! Fake! Do not purchase. Labeling is off. Missing info on label and box. No seal.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and I do not get much sleep after I apply this to my face it never looks like I miss sleep it clear my dark spots from under my eyes and leave my skin looking wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Monica D. Burney

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SOLUTION FOR SOMETHING WITH OILY SKIN, BREAKOUTs AND WRINKLES!!
customer_reviews.text: works great!!! I am hooked and will continue to use. So rich and I can see the difference in my skin. Its hard when you have oily skin but are getting wrinkles too. I need something to nourish my skin but its hard to find anything with really deep moisture when the product has to be oil free. i still break out and even the smallest hint of oil! I love this product and would HIGHLY recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!!! I use this every morning before I put on any make up. It does not leave any residue. It is wonderful, we now keep it stocked!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Thick product so I can only use at night. It doesn't work at all under my makeup and face gets super oily. I hate that it has fragrance (I thought I ordered the fragrance free so that's my bad). Does moisturize through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Good Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot, it goes right in, and doesn't have sunscreen. I would rather used my own sunscreen and not have it in a face cream. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lieb

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, not too thick or thin. Perfect moisturizer for night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Clean-feeling and good moisture
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion. Smells good, non-greasy. Not sure if I'd say it does everything it claims to do, but I continue to buy it. Doesn't clog my pores and that's a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aging
customer_reviews.text: To all the older folks out there I would recommend you use this product it work really well, I'm 52 yrs.old and I don't look my age bcause I use the olay anti aging products and they work for me so I think you guys should try it too.
customer_reviews.author: S.I.T.

product_meta.title: Olay Total Effects, 1.7 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Style:Face MoisturizerOlay Total Effects is Olay's Preventative Skin Care Collection. Total Effects Moisturizer with VitaNiacin Complex II fights 7 signs of aging. This creamy vitamin-rich moisturizer deeply hydrates to nourish, replenishing skin's moisture barrier.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Total Effects Advanced Creamy Face Moisturizer Formula Fights 7 Signs of Aging in 1 Easy Step
Vitamin-Rich Formula Hydrates to Nourish, Replenishing Skin's Moisture Barrier
VitaNiacin Complex II, with Vitamins C & E, Exfoliate to Enhance Skin’s Natural Self-Renewal Process for Healthier Looking Skin, while Antioxidants Defend Against Surface Free Radicals
Oil Free: Will not clog pores, Fast-Absorbing, Non-Greasy Formula
7 benefits in 1: Replenishes Moisture, Evens Skin Tone Appearance, Enhances Brightness, Visibly Smoothes Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Minimizes the Look of Pores, Restores Firmness
